specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Performance Mechanical Stretch Mechanical stretch in textiles refers to the ability of a fabric to stretch and recover without elastomeric / spandex fibers. It is a property that provides comfort, flexibility, and ease of movement to the wearer. Recommended Use Bridal, Dresses, Pajamas
